summary: for good omens friends - there’s a wonderful interview with michael sheen in yesterday’s observer magazine if you can get your...
body: for good omens friends - there’s a wonderful interview with michael sheen in yesterday’s observer magazine if you can get your hands on it! there isn’t too much good omens talk but it’s a really good interview - if anyone’s interested i’ll scan it and upload it on here!

summary: Michael Sheen: ‘Anything I do, I commit to’
title: Michael Sheen: ‘Anything I do, I commit to’
body:
Michael Sheen: ‘Anything I do, I commit to’

Michael Sheen’s many roles, from Caligula to Blair, have always been full-blooded. But now it’s social injustice that really gets him going

One of the things the actor Michael Sheenlikes about being famous is that he can get in touch with other famous people who he likes and tell them that he likes them, especially on social media. “It’s like totally platonic dating in a way,” he says, his voice…

View On WordPress

summary: So @bringthekaos moved Good Omens to the romance section of Barnes and Noble and shared her post about it on Twitter, @ Michael...
body:
I Love My Sister: An Appreciation Post

So @bringthekaos moved Good Omens to the romance section of Barnes and Noble and shared her post about it on Twitter, @ Michael Sheen as a joke. And then this happened.

And here is the ensuing text message exchange between us, evidence that I have the best sister in the world and I love sharing fandoms with her.

reblog.comment:

summary: so i was going through the transcription of an old press meeting with the good omens cast and i loudly GASPED because i had...
body:
so i was going through the transcription of an old press meeting with the good omens cast and i loudly GASPED because i had completely forgotten this quote by michael sheen: “[aziraphale] is an angel, he just loves, so because he spends most of his time with this not person [crowley], this character, he loves this character”.

gosh i’ll never finish this article because asdfghjkl my feels

Aziraphale, Guardian of the Eastern Gate, Principality of Earth, Lover of Sushi (and Crowley), and Giver of Zero Fucks.

He is an absolute trash angel and I love him for it.
